newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax Systems to acquire systems company.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax Systems to acquire systems company.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said Wednesday it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire Hi-TECH Connections Inc, a data network systems integration and network management company.

The closing is subject to the completion of final merger documents, the completion of due diligence, and final approval by the board of directors of Eltrax and by the shareholders of Hi-TECH, Eltrax said, adding that Reading, Pennsylvania-based Hi-TECH's revenue for its fiscal year ended September 30 was about $9.2 million.
Shares of Eltrax, an integrator of communications products and services for enterprise wide networks, were unchanged at 7-3/8 Wednesday.
